articles.title: Yehiel Yegudayev
articles.contents:
Yehiel Yegudayev
          
          
          Home
          About
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Yehiel Yegudayev
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                         LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            I am an ambitious industrial engineer graduate and
            professional data Center engineer with 10 years of hands-on
            experience. A strong believer in the can-do attitude, and
            with creativity and hard work I am always achieving my
            goals. The next step in my career will be a role that will
            excite me every morning, whether it’s in engineering,
            analytical or consulting role. I look forward to exposing
            myself to new challenges and gaining new skills through
            this.
            
            
            Education
            SCE | Beer-Sheva, Israel
            B.Sc. in Industrial Engineering and Management | October
            2018 - March 2023
            
            
            Experience
            Oracle | Senior Data Center Engineer |
            August 2021 - Present
            Leidos | Data Center Engineer | December
            2020 - May 2021
            M.S.R Engineering & Development |
            Data Center consultant | August 2017 - December 2020
            IAF | Research Scientist | January 2013
            - January 2017
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Yehiel Yegudayev
